casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Ford Motor Company, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Ford Motor Co. v. Indus. Comm. (2001), 93 Ohio St.3d 499.]

*500(No. 01-611 Submitted September 18, 2001 Decided October 31, 2001.) Timothy J. Krantz, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Dennis H. Behm, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission. Stanley Junes Law Office and Robert M. Robinson, for appellee Joseph Serian.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, .Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
